text: tavada ahashi marga veta ma pivisa musage deviya ma dækabala gata yutuyi. "enamut niyata vasayenma ohu borukarayeku lesa mama sitami” firavunge napuru kriyavan ohuta alamkara kara penvanu læbuve elesaya. tavada rju margayen ohu valakvanu læbiya. firavunge kumantranaya vinasaya tula misa noviya
